newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turk Tupras imports 75,000 T gas oil from Tempo.
newsitem.headline: Turk Tupras imports 75,000 T gas oil from Tempo.

text.p: Turkey's state oil refinery, Tupras, has imported a total of 75,000 tonnes of gas oil from Tempo through a tender and the cargoes will arrive in three equal deliveries, it said in a statement.
The first delivery of 25,000 tonnes, priced at $8.6 per tonne (cost and freight) on fob Mediterranean Italy price quotations, will arrive in Izmit on June 20-26, it said.
The second one was priced at $10.35 and will be delivered to Iskenderun on June 25-29. The third cargo, priced at $7.24, will be delivered in Izmit on July 1-5, it said.
Tupras put out the tender on June 9.
